message.content:
I need to calculate the Net Profit Margin based on the income statement provided.

The Net Profit Margin is calculated using the formula:
Net Profit Margin = (Net Profit / Total Revenue) × 100%

From the income statement:
- Net Profit = -1,175,062.19
- Total Revenue = 7,099,920.95

Let me calculate the Net Profit Margin:
Net Profit Margin = (-1,175,062.19 / 7,099,920.95) × 100%
Net Profit Margin = -0.1655 × 100%
Net Profit Margin = -16.55%

```json
{"solution": {'Net Profit Margin': '-16.55%'}}
```
